scripts.main:scss: mkdir -p dist/css/main && node-sass --output-style nested --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --source-map true -o dist/css/main source/scss/main/main.scss
scripts.main:scss:min: mkdir -p dist/css/main && node-sass --output-style compressed source/scss/main/main.scss > dist/css/main/main.min.css
scripts.sprite:svg: mkdir -p dist/sprite && svg-sprite -cD dist/sprite --cs ../sprite.svg --css-render-scss-dest ../sprite.scss --log verbose --cscss source/sprite/*.svg && mv dist/sprite/sprite.scss source/scss/main/components/_sprite.scss
scripts.main:build:css: npm run main:scss && npm run main:scss:min && npm run main:autoprefixer && npm run sprite:svg
scripts.admin:scss: mkdir -p dist/css/admin && node-sass --output-style nested --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --source-map true -o dist/css/admin source/scss/admin/admin.scss
scripts.admin:scss:min: mkdir -p dist/css/admin && node-sass --output-style compressed source/scss/admin/admin.scss > dist/css/admin/admin.min.css
scripts.admin:build:css: npm run admin:scss && npm run admin:scss:min && npm run admin:autoprefixer
scripts.login:scss: mkdir -p dist/css/login && node-sass --output-style nested --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --source-map true -o dist/css/login source/scss/login/login.scss
scripts.login:scss:min: mkdir -p dist/css/login && node-sass --output-style compressed source/scss/login/login.scss > dist/css/login/login.min.css
scripts.login:build:css: npm run login:scss && npm run login:scss:min && npm run login:autoprefixer
scripts.all:build:css: parallelshell 'npm run main:build:css' 'npm run admin:build:css' 'npm run login:build:css'
scripts.main:build:js: mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs source/js/ajax-query.js source/js/app.js -m -c --name-cache /tmp/cache.json -o dist/js/app.min.js --lint --source-map dist/js/app.min.js.map
scripts.head:build:js: mkdir -p dist/js/head && uglifyjs source/js/head/*.js -m -c --name-cache /tmp/cache.json -o dist/js/head/head.min.js --lint --source-map dist/js/head/app.min.js.map
scripts.single:build:js: mkdir -p dist/js/single && uglifyjs source/js/single/main-slider.js -m -c --name-cache /tmp/cache.json -o dist/js/single/main-slider.min.js --lint --source-map dist/js/single/main-slider.min.js.map
scripts.all:build:js: parallelshell 'npm run main:uglify' 'npm run head:uglify' 'npm run single:uglify'
scripts.watch:all: parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:headjs'
scripts.build:all: parallelshell 'npm run all:build:js' 'npm run all:build:css' 'npm run favicon' 'npm run imagemin'
